titles: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon to the inhabitants of His counties of Stafford and Derby.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: At foot of title: Given at our Court at Oxford, this five and twentieth day of March, in the eighteenth yeer of our reigne. God save the King.
A London reprint of the Oxford original.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
